survey_brief: This survey aims to understand commuter preferences and challenges related to urban mobility, focusing on modes of transportation, satisfaction levels, and suggestions for improvement.

questions.question_text: What is your primary mode of transportation for daily commuting?
questions.client_notes: Ensure options cover all common urban mobility choices.

script.question_text: What is your primary mode of transportation for daily commuting?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your primary mode of transportation?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard 5-point Likert scale for consistency.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your primary mode of transportation?

questions.question_text: What are the top three challenges you face with your current mode of transportation?
questions.client_notes: Allow multi-selection to capture multiple pain points.

script.question_text: What are the top three challenges you face with your current mode of transportation?

questions.question_text: How often do you use alternative transportation modes (e.g., switching from car to bike or public transit)?
questions.client_notes: Use clear frequency options to gauge flexibility.

script.question_text: How often do you use alternative transportation modes (e.g., switching from car to bike or public transit)?

questions.question_text: What factors would encourage you to use public transit more often?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Public transit' in Q1 or 'Weekly'/'Monthly'/'Rarely' in Q4
questions.client_notes: Targeted question for public transit users or occasional switchers.

script.question_text: What factors would encourage you to use public transit more often?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Public transit' in Q1 or 'Weekly'/'Monthly'/'Rarely' in Q4

questions.question_text: How important is environmental sustainability in your choice of transportation?
questions.client_notes: 5-point scale to measure prioritization of sustainability.

script.question_text: How important is environmental sustainability in your choice of transportation?

questions.question_text: Would you be willing to pay a premium for eco-friendly transportation options (e.g., electric buses, bike-sharing)?
answer_options: No, I would not pay more
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Extremely'/'Very'/'Moderately important' in Q6
questions.client_notes: Use conditional logic to target sustainability-conscious respondents.

script.question_text: Would you be willing to pay a premium for eco-friendly transportation options (e.g., electric buses, bike-sharing)?
answer_options: No, I would not pay more
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Extremely'/'Very'/'Moderately important' in Q6

questions.question_text: What improvements would make walking or cycling more appealing for your commute?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Bicycle or e-bike'/'Walking' in Q1

script.question_text: What improvements would make walking or cycling more appealing for your commute?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Bicycle or e-bike'/'Walking' in Q1

questions.question_text: How likely are you to use a mobility-as-a-service (MaaS) app that integrates multiple transport options (e.g., transit, bikes, ride-sharing) into one platform?
questions.client_notes: Gauge interest in integrated mobility solutions.

script.question_text: How likely are you to use a mobility-as-a-service (MaaS) app that integrates multiple transport options (e.g., transit, bikes, ride-sharing) into one platform?

questions.question_text: What additional services would you find valuable in a mobility app? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Rewards or discounts for eco-friendly choices
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Very likely'/'Somewhat likely' in Q9

script.question_text: What additional services would you find valuable in a mobility app? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Rewards or discounts for eco-friendly choices
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Very likely'/'Somewhat likely' in Q9

questions.question_text: How do you typically plan your commuting routes?
answer_options: Using navigation apps (Google Maps, Waze, etc.)
questions.client_notes: Identify reliance on digital tools for route planning.

script.question_text: How do you typically plan your commuting routes?
answer_options: Using navigation apps (Google Maps, Waze, etc.)

questions.question_text: Describe any major pain points you experience with your current commuting method (open-ended).

script.question_text: Describe any major pain points you experience with your current commuting method (open-ended).
